name: Roka Blocks Game - Fun & Hexagon Puzzle
summary:
New hexagon puzzle game is now more colorful and available on Apple Store. Download this free fun puzzle game and show who is smart to the world! The only thing you need to place hexagonal block puzzles correctly. 
There are 4 different level and 60 different maps for each levels in the game. You will never forget experience of “Roka Blocks Game - Fun & Hexagon Puzzle”! 
 
 You will have a lot of fun with our game, which is different than similar fun puzzle games. If you play the game once, you will never want to quit the game with enjoyable graphics and increasingly challenging levels. 
 
How to play “Roka Blocks Game - Fun & Hexagon Puzzle” ? 
 
There is a frame and hexagonal block puzzles for every map. Your aim is to place correctly these puzzles to frame. When you place all of the hexagonal block puzzles correctly, a new map will be waiting for you! The game is one of the best fun puzzle game in the world. 
 
We work hard to provide best game experience for our users. With enjoyable music and sound effects, we tried to make the game more entertaining. You can get tip rewards by watching rewarded video. These tips will you help in harder maps.

* Most downloaded hexagon puzzle game in a short time
